name: Victory Monday Game
description:
This is 'Victory Monday Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media. In 2015 we launched 'The Revenge of the Luce!', which ended up being an amazing success due to our community entry, and also won 'Best of 2015' at the London Game Awards.
This is the second year that we've worked together, this time we're approaching the fifth anniversary of Outhouse Media. Since then we've worked on our first game 'Fear & Loathing In Las Vegas', which is now a massive success. We've released a number of other titles both personal and commercial as well, but our first title that you are likely to buy is 'Raining Monsters', which may be the most controversial game of each year, from a developer perspective. You may be thinking, "oh, it's about zombies". Well, you're right. It IS about zombies. We've been working hard on this game for several years. We've spent months of our lives trying to come up with a unique and exciting twist on a zombie survival game, something that would capture the wish of future gamers to enjoy our great games as they used to. We've been interested in developing this game for quite a while and by the end of March this year we began distribution to some of the gaming world's most influential and respected publishers. We're incredibly excited about the project, and are really excited to share it with you. Why Kickstarter?
